about_the_game:
Short Description:

Transport yourself to an exclusive, affluent suburban neighborhood and step into the role of a new neighbor to some incredibly alluring, wealthy women. In American MILF, you’re free to visit their luxurious homes, chat, make decisions, and… indulge in unforgettable fun, including the use of erotic accessories.

Key Features:

  • Full VR Immersion – Explore spacious, luxurious estates in virtual reality.

  • Wealthy Neighbors – Each woman has a distinct personality and secrets you can discover through interaction.

  • Short Dialogues & Choices – Your style of conversation and the decisions you make influence the progression of the story.

  • Spicy Gameplay Mechanics – Use dildos during erotic scenes, and watch how the characters react to your actions and touch.

  • Adults Only – Explicit, detailed erotic content, including nudity and various forms of sexual interaction, intended for players aged 18+.

Why Give It a Try?

If you’re looking for a lighthearted, entertaining VR game with a strong erotic flair and want to immerse yourself in a world full of temptation, American MILF will deliver experiences like no other. Enjoy full freedom of movement in virtual, upscale interiors, and take advantage of a wealth of interactive possibilities with seductive neighbors.

Uncover their secrets, discover how they respond to your actions during intimate encounters, and create your own suburban fantasy that will stay with you for a long time. All of this is waiting for you in American MILF!

name: American MILF

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060 (or equivalent)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
